mapper.select: SELECT tbl_member.member_seq, username, password, enabled, name, birth, gender, image FROM tbl_member JOIN tbl_auth ON tbl_member.member_seq = tbl_auth.member_seq WHERE tbl_auth.authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (member_seq, username, password, name, birth, gender, image) VALUES (seq_member.nextval, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_member WHERE member_seq = #{ member_seq }
mapper.select: SELECT tbl_member.*, tbl_auth.authority FROM tbl_member JOIN tbl_auth ON tbl_member.member_seq = tbl_auth.member_seq WHERE username = #{username}
select member_seq, username, name, email, birth, enabled from tbl_member where ${searchOption} like concat('%', concat( '${searchWord}', '%'))
